definition: to work industriously/to get things done
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Have an action orientation and strong desire to achieve.
sentences.chinese: 具有实干精神和强烈的成功愿望。

sentences.english: Making great effort to do actually is the basic work attitude of vanguard robot.
sentences.chinese: 努力实干是增盛塑胶人的基本工作态度。

sentences.english: We just need to put into practice what we already know. Be a doer of the Word.
sentences.chinese: 我们只需将所知付诸实践，做个真正的实干家。

sentences.english: Of course, doing takes a lot more time. It’s also much harder.
sentences.chinese: 当然，实干可能会更花时间，也更艰难。

sentences.english: It is a process of action and hard work.
Think of things clearly and work hard.
sentences.chinese: 努力实干是东荣的基本工作态度。

sentences.english: From the company now has been set up to work hard with the spirit of hard work go now.
sentences.chinese: 从公司成立到现在一直凭着苦干实干的精神走到现在。

sentences.english: I think the simplest definition of maturity is to be a doer of the word.You do what the Bible says.
sentences.chinese: 我认为成熟最直接的含义就是要做个实干家。

sentences.english: It is the unsung achiever of our prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 它可是我们的繁荣默默无闻的实干家。

sentences.english: By doing instead of talking, things started to happen.
sentences.chinese: 实干代替了空谈，那些事情开始一一兑现。

sentences.english: I am a doer and I can contribute a great deal to the company.
sentences.chinese: 我是个实干者，我能为公司贡献很多。

sentences.english: In every domain I can think of, the people who are the most regarded are the doers.
sentences.chinese: 在我能想到的每一领域里，最被人看重的是实干家。

sentences.english: They also provide a boost for you, the doer.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能会帮助你成为一名实干家。

sentences.english: With the enterprising spirit of the people, remember to choose direction is more important than hard work.
sentences.chinese: 拥有实干精神的人，切记选对方向比努力拼搏更重要。

sentences.english: I think I should a doer , no need to modify the beautiful words.
sentences.chinese: 我想我该当个实干家，不需要那些美丽的词汇来修饰。

sentences.english: Men and women of action always outrank armchair intellectuals.
sentences.chinese: 实干的凡人总是强于脱离实际的智者。

definition: to bury oneself in work (idiom); to be engrossed in work/to make an all-out effort/up to the neck in work
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character
to carry out (obligation) conscientiously/to behave sincerely
to dare to be first/to pioneer (idiom)
to tackle a thorny problem and overcome its challenges
to preserve the accomplishments of previous generations/to carry on the good work of one's predecessors
